Description: Mosaic slice inlay: a slice containing the right half of a female face, a tragic mask. Opaque grey-green field, matt surface. The head is frontal with brown hair with white details. A ribbon looped at each end, encircling the head, is in pink-red, white, and black. The skin is white with details of the face in black and red.
Bibliographic references: Tait 1991 / Five Thousand Years of Glass (pl.59)
